abilities.name: Shuriken
abilities.description: Launches a spinning blade of pain, dealing high damage and impaling enemies to walls.

abilities.name: Smoke Screen
abilities.description: Ash creates a smoke screen that obscures vision and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Teleport
abilities.description: Teleport to a target and perform a finisher.

abilities.name: Blade Storm
abilities.description: Project fierce Shadow Clones of Ash upon groups of distant enemies.

abilities.name: Landslide
abilities.description: Bash enemies with an explosive sliding punch, repeat up to three times for a combo attack.

abilities.name: Tectonics
abilities.description: Summon a Bulwark rock-wall, activate again to send the rocks crashing toward the enemy.

abilities.name: Petrify
abilities.description: Atlas' hardened gaze will fossilize foes increasing the damage they take, heal Rumblers, and create Petrified Bulwarks.

abilities.name: Rumblers
abilities.description: Summon two elemental stone brawlers to the melee.

abilities.name: Sonic boom
abilities.description: Banshee emits a sonic shockwave that pushes targets in range with enough force to incapacitate or kill attackers.

abilities.name: Sonar
abilities.description: Using acoustic location, Banshee's Sonar power finds and tracks enemies, and exposes critical weak spots to everyone in your squad.

abilities.name: Silence
abilities.description: Using Silence surrounds Banshee in an aura that stuns enemies and will limit their perceptions and tactical response to gunfire and Warframe attacks.

abilities.name: Sound quake
abilities.description: Channeling all of her acoustic energy into the environment, Banshee uses ultrasonic reverberations to violently shake the ground.

abilities.name: Elude
abilities.description: Dodge all incoming projectiles, but only while not attacking.

abilities.name: Lull
abilities.description: A calming wave slows enemies until they fall into a slumber.

abilities.name: Desolating hands
abilities.description: Summon a bevy of orbiting daggers to seek out enemy guns, destroying them with a small explosion.

abilities.name: Serene Storm
abilities.description: With his Restraint eroded, Baruuk commands the Desert Wind to deliver powerful radial strikes with his fists and feet.

abilities.name: Razor Gyre
abilities.description: Dash forward in a spinning vortex of death.

abilities.name: Sentien Wrath
abilities.description: Smash the ground sending out a radial wave of destruction.

abilities.name: Lethal Progeny
abilities.description: Cycle through Sentient unit types, then summon them to Caliban's side.

abilities.name: Fusion Strike
abilities.description: Converge three streams of raw energy upon a single point, causing a massive explosion.

abilities.name: Elemental Scream
abilities.description: Exhale a deep breath of elemental destruction.

abilities.name: Elemental Ward
abilities.description: Depending on Chroma's elemental alignment, an offensive area-of-effect is created.

abilities.name: Vex Armor
abilities.description: Chroma fortifies squad Armor when his Shields are damaged or he kills an enemy with a melee weapon.

abilities.name: Effigy
abilities.description: Chroma turns his pelt into a massive sentry that strengthens nearby allies and engulfs enemies in elemental attacks.

abilities.name: Fractured Blast
abilities.description: Slash and stagger enemies with a crystal blast that inflicts Slash Status.

abilities.name: Preserving Shell
abilities.description: Citrine guards herself and nearby allies with a crystalline shell that gradually decays.

abilities.name: Prismatic Gem
abilities.description: Deploy a gem that shoots prismatic beams.

abilities.name: Crystallize
abilities.description: Citrine summons crystal fractals. The fractals rush forward, seeking enemies.

abilities.name: Seek
abilities.description: Plant an antenna that projects a forward wave scan. Detected enemies take increased Weak Point Damage, and become visible through walls.

abilities.name: Resupply
abilities.description: Throw two Elemental Ammo Packs that instantly refill the active weapon's magazine, while granting the weapon an additional instance of the selected Elemental Damage and Status Effect.

abilities.name: Evade
abilities.description: Jump backwards and become invisible for a short duration.

abilities.name: Neutralize
abilities.description: Summon the Neutralizer, Cyte-09's exalted Sniper Rifle. Bullets ricochet off Weak Points to seek out other nearby Weak Points.

abilities.name: Wyrd Scythes
abilities.description: Wyrd Scythes surround Dagath and seek out nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Doom
abilities.description: Condemn nearby enemies to their doom.

abilities.name: Grave Spirit
abilities.description: Supercharge Dagath's weapons with extra Critical Damage.

abilities.name: Rakhali's Cavalry
abilities.description: Phantom Kaithes charge forth, inflicting Viral Damage upon all in their path. Their attack strips the defenses of Doomed enemies.

abilities.name: Noctua
abilities.description: Open Noctua, Dante's Exalted Tome, and unleash a tale of woe upon his enemies.

abilities.name: Light Verse
abilities.description: Dante's vitalizing composition grants him and his allies Overguard and increases their Health

abilities.name: Dark Verse
abilities.description: Dante's composition draws blood from nearby enemies, inflicting Slash Damage upon them.

abilities.name: Final Verse
abilities.description:
Dante must compose two other Verses before his Final Verse.
            TRIUMPH: Two Light Verses cast in succession invigorate allies with a buff that increases Health and grants Overguard. Kills and assists briefly regenerate Overguard.
            TRAGEDY: Two Dark Verses cast in succession attack enemies. Damage Over Time from Slash, Heat and Toxin Status Effects accumulates in a single blast.
            WORDWARDEN: A Light Verse followed by a Dark Verse supports allies with copies of Noctua. Noctua copies synchronize their attacks with their designated ally's attacks.
            PAGEFLIGHT: A Dark Verse followed by a Light Verse summons Paragrimms that swoop at enemies, making them vulnerable to Status Chance and Status Damage, as well as drawing enemy attacks away from allies.
effect: Damage Instant AOE / Buff Overguard AOE

abilities.name: Fireball
abilities.description: Release a fiery projectile that ignites enemies on contact.

abilities.name: Immolation
abilities.description: Protect Ember with flame armor that burns stronger over time, consuming energy once its meter is at full strength.

abilities.name: Fire Blast
abilities.description: Slam the ground to create a wave of incinerating plasma that knocks back enemies and strips their armor.

abilities.name: Inferno
abilities.description: Command a flaming comet to crash down in front of Ember, engulfing enemies with a fire that can spread through their ranks.

abilities.name: Slash Dash
abilities.description: Dash between enemies, dealing damage.

abilities.name: Radial Blind
abilities.description: Blinds enemies in a radius, disabling them temporarily.

abilities.name: Radial Javelin
abilities.description: Radial javelins impale nearby enemies, inflicting Slash Status.

abilities.name: Exalted Blade
abilities.description: Summon a sword of pure light and immense power.

abilities.name: Light's Judgement
abilities.description: Create a well of light that heals allies and hurts enemies. Those who enter the well will be highlighted by Judgments.

abilities.name: Symphony of Mercy
abilities.description: Cycle through three songs that strengthen allies.

abilities.name: Ophanim Eyes
abilities.description: Jade summons an accusatory gaze that slows nearby enemies and dissolves their Shields and Armor.

abilities.name: Glory on High
abilities.description: Soar with destructive power. Use alternate-fire to detonate Judgments, causing an explosion of Jade Light.

abilities.name: Banish
abilities.description: Send enemies into another plane of existence for a short period of time.

abilities.name: Stasis
abilities.description: Freeze all projectiles in the Rift.

abilities.name: Rift Surge
abilities.description: Banished enemies that die in the Rift will release a surge that banishes other enemies.

abilities.name: Cataclysm
abilities.description: Rip open a cataclysmic rift that can either banish enemies or protect allies.

abilities.name: Virulence
abilities.description: Nidus sends out a tendrils that burst from the ground, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.

abilities.name: Larva
abilities.description: Nidus summons a living mass of maggots to draw in enemies.

abilities.name: Parasitic Link
abilities.description: Bind to a target with a parasitic link to transfer damage taken to the host.

abilities.name: Ravenous
abilities.description: Create an aura of parasitic maggots that feed on the enemies.

abilities.name: Chyrinka Pillar
abilities.description: Summon a Chyrinka Pillar that slows enemies. It pulses Radiation Damage with a guaranteed Status Effect.

abilities.name: Containment Wall
abilities.description: Contain the threat. Qorvex summons walls that slam together, damaging all enemies caught between them and inflicting Radiation Status.

abilities.name: Disometric guard
abilities.description: Guard yourself and nearby allies against Status Effects.

abilities.name: Crucible Blast
abilities.description: Release a beam from Qorvex's Crucible Core.

abilities.name: Reap
abilities.description: Sevagoth's Shadow flies outward ravaging enemies in his path.

abilities.name: Sow
abilities.description: Plant a death seed in nearby targets to drain their lifeforce. Reap what has been sown to detonate afflicted enemies, dealing a percentage of their health as radial damage.

abilities.name: Gloom
abilities.description: Summon a radial pulse wave that ensnares and slows enemies, siphoning their lifeforce for the Death Well.

abilities.name: Exalted Shadow
abilities.description: When the Death Well fills, Sevagoth's Shadow form is ready to be released. Tear the enemy asunder with a collection of melee-focused abilities.

abilities.name: Axios Javelin
abilities.description: Throw an Axios Javelin. When the javelin impales an enemy against a wall, surrounding enemies are pulled into the area and suffer a burst of damage.

abilities.name: Tharros Strike
abilities.description: Summon Tharros, the shield of Styanax. Swing Tharros to repel enemies and reduce their shields and armor. Styanax regenerates health for every enemy struck.

abilities.name: Rally Point
abilities.description: Draw enemy attention to Styanax. His resolve uplifts him and nearby allies, regenerating the squad's energy over time. Styanax and his allies also regenerate shields for every kill assist they contribute.

abilities.name: Final Stand
abilities.description: Exude might and valor. Rise into the air and throw a barrage of Axios Javelins. The javelins deal damage to nearby enemies wherever they land.

abilities.name: Shock
abilities.description: Launches a shocking projectile.

abilities.name: Speed
abilities.description: Increases the movement speed of Volt and his allies.

abilities.name: Electric Shield
abilities.description: Deploys an obstacle of energy, providing cover in any situation.

abilities.name: Discharge
abilities.description: Paralyzes nearby hostiles with a damaging electric charge.

abilities.name: Shroud of Dynar
abilities.description: Dynar shrouds Voruna with invisibility and accelerates her speed. Invisibility ends when Voruna attacks.

abilities.name: Fangs of Raksh
abilities.description: Raksh's fangs tear into your enemies. 5 random Status Effects are applied at 10 Stacks each on an enemy. On target's death, spread the Status Effects to other nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Lycath's hunt
abilities.description: Lycath hunts to sustain the pack. Enemies killed by melee attacks drop health orbs and enemies killed by headshots drop energy orbs.

abilities.name: Ulfrun's descent
abilities.description: Voruna drops to all fours and prepares 5 brutal charges that lock onto enemies.

abilities.name: Xata's Whisper
abilities.description: Wield Void Damage for all attacks from equipped weapons when activated.

abilities.name: Grasp of Lohk
abilities.description: Void Tendrils steal weapons from nearby enemies to use as your own floating, auto-targeting armament.

abilities.name: The Lost
abilities.description: Cycle through a trio of lost Warframe powers.

abilities.name: The Vast Untime
abilities.description: Temporarily shed the outer pieces of Xaku in a destructive blast, then stalk the battlefield in a new, swifter skeletal form.
